title: Khao Lak Beachfront Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description:
Stunning beachfront luxury awaits you at the deluxe Moracea by Khao Lak Resort, a spectacular private resort elevated on a hillside gently sloping towards golden sands. Surrounded by lush greenery for a rainforest feel, the modern resort boasts a tranquil spa, outdoor pools, a vibrant swim-up bar and a glamorous restaurant with stunning sunset views. With a design incorporating traditional Thai elements with a contemporary twist, Moracea by Khao Lak Resort is the ideal secluded island escape.

Trek the depths of Khao Lak National Park, float through the jungle on a bamboo raft, or grab your snorkelling gear and explore the nearby Similan Islands, filled with stunning coral reefs and exciting marine life. Head back after a long day of travelling for a cocktail and breathtaking sunset vistas.
offer_address: 26/20 Khuekkhak, Takua Pa District, Phang Nga 82220, Thailand

vendor_name: The Anda Mani Khaolak Beachfront Villas
title: Secluded Khao Lak Beachfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Succumb to the enchanting call of Thailand's Andaman Sea with a stay at The Anda Mani Khaolak Beachfront Villas. Nestled amid lush tropical gardens, this boutique resort offers direct access to the pristine sands of Khao Lak beach, while sitting just moments from Khao Lak village. Unrivalled hospitality means your every whim is catered for - start the day with a delicious breakfast at The Kitchen by The Anda Mani, take your pick of a sumptuous lunch or dinner and sip on a cocktail as the sun sets.

Venture out via speedboat to explore the stunning Similan Islands, renowned for their vibrant marine life and crystal-clear waters, or sample authentic Thai cuisine at the local eateries at the Bang Niang Market. Back at the resort, unwind in your tranquil oasis, complete with high-end amenities and breathtaking views of the ocean beyond.
location_description: The Anda Mani Khaolak Beachfront Villas
offer_address: 7/9 Moo 2, Laem Kaen, Thai Mueang District, Phang Nga 82210, Thailand

vendor_name: JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa
title: Bestselling JW Marriot Khao Lak Luxury with Southeast Asia's Longest Pool & All-Inclusive Dining (Select Packages Only)
description:
Our bestselling Thailand resort is back - the five-star JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa has it all. Situated on one of the best beachfronts in Thailand, the gentle ocean waves are a perfect complement to the meandering curves of one of Southeast Asia’s longest pools. Choose a Pool Access room and dive from your private terrace straight into the shimmering waters, where you could spend hours swimming and never run out of room in the 2.4-kilometre-long pool. The resort is smartly designed to allow privacy and serenity with plenty of dedicated adults-only areas, while families have their own space with waterslides, a wave pool and the Bamboo Shark Nursery and Conservation Centre.

Elevate your resort escape with access to incredible culinary delights and fantastic service across a variety of chic eateries. Enjoy breakfast at one of Southern Thailand's most acclaimed buffets -featuring classic Western dishes as well as Asian favourites like bottomless dumplings - savour lunch overlooking the pool and devour dinner at your choice of three mouthwatering restaurants, choosing Italian favourites at Olive, traditional Thai specialties at Ta-Krai, Japanese classics at Sakura or international fare at the Beach Bar. Among all that delicious food, don’t forget to sample a few expertly prepared cocktails at one of the two swim-up bars during happy hour.
location_description: JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa
offer_address: 41/12 Moo 3 Khuk Khak, Khao Lak, Takua Pa District, Phang-nga 82220, Thailand

title: Grand Reopening: Khao Lak Outrigger Beachfront Oasis with Massages, Gourmet Dining, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Set amid a luscious backdrop of forested headlands and the palm-fringed sands of Bangsak Beach lies your next tranquil escape - the newly reopened Outrigger Khao Lak Beach Resort. Anyone yearning for an escape will love this peaceful gem - a recently renovated, spacious haven overlooking the azure waters of the Andaman Sea, boasting all the luxuries guests have come to expect from the Outrigger brand.

Featuring a beautiful lagoon swimming pool, the Massage Sala by the Beach and two restaurants serving up international cuisine with a locally inspired twist, this property has been perfectly designed to cater to everyone’s version of paradise - and even includes a kids' club to keep the little ones entertained. Located only 15 minutes from the vibrant Khao Lak Village and the colourful shopping and dining options of Bangsak and within easy reach of watersports and local attractions, there's no better base for your Thailand adventure.
offer_address: 2/4 Moo 8, Bangmuang, Takuapa, Phang Nga, 82190, Thailand

title: Khao Lak Beachfront Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Jungle meets the beach at this slice of paradise, where turquoise waves kiss golden sands just steps from your room. Surrounded by tropical greenery, Khao Lak awaits you at this sprawling resort elevated on a hillside. Moracea by Khao Lak Resort boasts a fantastic spa, outdoor pools, a vibrant swim-up bar and a casual beach restaurant with stunning sunset views.

Haggle for treasures at nearby Bang Niang's buzzing night market, chase waterfalls in Khao Lak-Lam Ru's lush rainforest, dive into an underwater wonderland at the Similan Islands or take a sobering journey through history at the Tsunami Memorial. This modern resort is the ideal flop-and-drop island escape.

description:
Surrounded by lush jungle and kissed by the shining waters of the Andaman Sea, Le Menara Khao Lak offers guests a family-friendly escape in one of Thailand’s most breathtaking regions. Located on the secluded sweeping shores of Bang Lut Beach - just an hour’s drive from Khlong Phanom National Park’s spectacular limestone mountain ranges - the resort’s authentic, village-inspired layout is backed by timeless French sophistication. Savour open-air dining with magnificent seaside views at L’Amore Restaurant, head to Le Sea Restaurant and Bar for aperitifs and exquisitely barbecued seafood or simply laze the evening away by the resort’s mirage-like central pool.

When you’re ready to explore, Khao Lak’s countless treasures await. Venture out Khao Sok National Park to discover breathtaking mountain lake vistas and the oldest evergreen rainforest in the world, surf and splash the day away in Khao Lak’s emerald waters or travel just 90-minutes south to Phuket to discover the island’s vibrant collection of marketplaces, sanctuaries and unforgettable nightlife.

title: Pullman Khao Lak Beachfront Escape with All-Inclusive Dining, Unlimited Drinks & Daily Massages
description:
There are some experiences in life that should not be missed, and a heavenly stay at Pullman Khao Lak Resort should be at the top of your travel to-do list. Perfectly positioned facing the cool blue waters of the Andaman Sea, this beachfront resort will cater to your every need in true Pullman style. While there's plenty to discover beyond the hotel, this luxury oasis will entice you to stay and enjoy. Savour a fusion of flavours at Plai Dining Room and Kram Beach Club, or sip on a cocktail at The Hub Pool bar or The Junction, plunge into one of four aquamarine pools, visit the serene Rosalyn Spa, or raise your heart rate at the 24-hour Pullman FIT centre. Plus, little ones can race through the twin-looped water slide, or hang at the kids’ club.

While the top-notch facilities make it difficult to tear yourself away from the serenity of the resort, the surrounding wonders reward those who choose to explore. For eager snorkellers or beach lovers, the gorgeous Similan and Surin islands are a must-visit, and for history enthusiasts, Takua Pa Old Town is located a short drive away.

title: Khao Lak Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Experience the tropical oasis that is Grand Mercure Khao Lak Bangsak, a pristine hideaway ensconced in tropical gardens on Thailand's tranquil southwest coast. Inspired by traditional riverside Thai villages, this unique resort is centred on a picturesque, winding canal, lined by immaculate accommodation. Tucked away in Khao Lak, this palm-fringed oasis is the ideal spot for a true Thai beachside experience. The tranquil town offers fun in the sun, fine-dining restaurants and boutique shops, on a background of jungle-clad mountains - this quiet corner of the country ensures you will leave your Thailand escape feeling completely relaxed.

Back at the resort, high-end amenities invite you to surrender to complete relaxation: enjoy an invigorating swim in the beachfront swimming pool, spoil yourself at the indulgent Pran Spa, or experience a fresh take on traditional Thai favourites at one of the two innovative onsite restaurants, Patio and Green Mango. Spend an afternoon sipping tropical cocktails at Soak Pool Bar, while the kids are entertained at the complimentary Manta Ray Kids' Corner before enjoying a stroll along the white-sand beach, located just moments away from the resort.

title: Serene Adults-Only Khao Lak Beachfront Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast, Dinners, Cocktails & Massages
description:
Escape the crowds with a blissful stay at Beyond Resort Khao Lak, an all-villa beachfront resort set on the pearly-white sands of Pak Weep Beach. Tucked on the serene coast of Phang Nga, around an 80-minute drive from Phuket, this palm-fringed oasis invites you to surrender to complete relaxation. Enjoy an invigorating swim in the oceanfront swimming pool, spoil yourself at the indulgent Kanda Spa or explore the tropical waters on a sea kayak or stand-up paddleboard while surrounded by unspoiled nature and verdant tropical greenery.

Khao Lak is the ideal spot for an authentic Thai beachside experience, with guests spoiled with fun in the sun while staying in a quieter corner of the country. Onsite fine-dining restaurants await to cater to any appetite, whether you dine on succulent seafood under the thatched roof of @Beach Bar and Restaurant, tuck into a flame-seared steak at Motown On Fire or enjoy a refreshing poolside drink in the tropical sun. Outside the resort, guests can find lush waterfalls, markets and monuments, as well as a host of deep sea activities - think world-class snorkelling, surfing and scuba diving.

Facing the beyond-blue waters of the Andaman Sea and catering to your every whim in true Pullman style, this five-star resort should be at the top of your travel list. There's something for everyone here: little ones can race through waterslides or play at the Kids’ Club while parents sip on cocktails poolside.

Cure any craving at Plai Dining Room, where a fusion of flavours is served in a laid-back indoor-outdoor atmosphere. Sat amid a luscious forested headland and flowing onto the dazzling sands of Nang Thong Beach, The Sands Khao Lak by Katathani is your tranquil and secluded escape just minutes from the town’s main shopping strip and an hour from vibrant Phuket. You need stray no further than the resort, as each wing is carefully crafted to cater to your need for rest, rejuvenation or play, so you can discover everything this resplendent tropical retreat has to offer, including The Sands Luxury Club.

Unwind across two pools, satiate any craving at your choice of three restaurants - including The Floating Market, overlooking the glistening lagoon - and sip drinks at four bars, all offering unique water vistas. Plus, there are distinct adults-only pool and garden areas, the Sands Castle kids' club and the pavilions of The Spa, which will embrace you with warm sea breezes and the scent of exotic flowers.

vendor_name: Devasom Khao Lak Beach Resort & Villas
title: Khao Lak Five-Star Beachfront Luxury with Massages, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner + Nightly Cocktails
description:
Where sea spray punctuates the air, the warm sun pokes its head around every corner and serenity radiates throughout; discover the essence of tranquil Thai luxury at Devasom Khao Lak Beach Resort & Villas. Expanding across three hectares of verdant coast and forest land, this pristine resort boasts plenty of opportunities for family-centred thrills, head-to-toe wellness and delicious coastal delights. Award-winning for a reason, making Tripadvisor’s Traveler’s Choice Best of the Best 2023 list, find five-star oceanfront opulence in abundance through the 69 rooms, suites and villas, which extend all the way to the semi-private shoreline.

Tucked away between a lagoon and Khao Lak’s famous sunset beach, enjoy easily tip-toeing directly to the stunning coastline, or venturing inland to explore the vibrant shopping and dining district on the resort’s shuttle. When you’re not soaking up the good vibes at the beach or in the sparkling pool, treat yourself to a pamper session at the resort’s own wellness centre. From nourishing breakfasts to moreish dinner dishes, experience exceptional Michelin-listed dining at one of the resort’s two incredible eateries.

title: Five-Star Khao Lak Beachside Oasis with Daily Breakfast, Massages & Cocktails
description:
Let your worries drift away at the spectacular Haven Khao Lak, an opulent resort located in a tranquil spot on the golden sands of Khuk Khak Beach, where privacy and comfort are valued above all else. Catering to guests 12 and older, this secluded oasis features an enormous 5,000sqm saltwater pool surrounded by verdant gardens, with the sapphire-blue ocean and a white-sand beach forming the backdrop to an indulgent escape. Pamper yourself with traditional Thai massages at Aqua Spa or indulge in a cocktail or two at Angel Wing Bar as you take in panoramic views of the Andaman Sea.

After exploring every inch of this exquisite resort, take a romantic stroll down Khuk Khak Beach and visit the nearby night markets, local restaurants, and bars. If you're a watersports aficionado, practice your snorkelling skills at any of the neighbouring islands or at the impressive Phang Nga Bay (additional charges apply). Then, head back for a decadent dinner at the resort’s Vongole Restaurant, where you’ll be treated to the freshest daily catch of seafood creatively dished up in traditional Thai style or in classic Italian favourites.

vendor_name: The Little Shore Khao Lak by Katathani
title: Brand-New Khao Lak Beachfront Pool Suites with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Tucked away on the pristine Nang Thong Beach, this recently-opened resort beckons with signature Katathani luxury and a collection of contemporary suites, each featuring a sparkling private pool. 

Discover the epitome of relaxation amid meticulously manicured resort gardens, savouring daily feasts at The Kati Restaurant, rejuvenating spa treatments at Nalinya Villa Spa and a delectable floating afternoon tea hand-delivered to your private pool.

Renowned for delivering unforgettable experiences with impeccable service, Katathani’s newest beachfront paradise will undoubtedly solidify its status as one of Thailand’s most-loved resort families.

description:
All-inclusive bliss awaits at Beyond Resort Khao Lak, an all-villa beachfront resort set on the pearly-white sands of Pak Weep Beach. Tucked on the serene coast of Phang Nga, around an 80-minute drive from Phuket, this palm-fringed oasis invites you to surrender to complete relaxation. Enjoy an invigorating swim in the oceanfront swimming pool, spoil yourself at the indulgent Kanda Spa or explore the tropical waters on a sea kayak or stand-up paddleboard while surrounded by unspoiled nature and verdant tropical greenery. Return from your adventures to all-inclusive breakfast, lunch and dinner, plus unlimited free-flow cocktails, beer, spirits and soft drinks to toast days spent in the sun.

Khao Lak is the ideal spot for an authentic Thai beachside experience, with guests spoiled with fun in the sun while staying in a quieter corner of the country. Onsite fine-dining restaurants await to cater to any appetite, whether you dine on succulent seafood under the thatched roof of @Beach Bar and Restaurant, tuck into a flame-seared steak at Motown On Fire Steakhouse or enjoy a refreshing poolside drink in the tropical sun. Inspired by nature, the ocean and the rich cultural heritage of the ancient Takola seaport, this haven features an enormous free-form swimming pool surrounded by verdant gardens, with the sapphire-blue ocean and a white-sand beach forming the backdrop to an indulgent escape.

Be sure to kick-start your day with a fresh breakfast at Spices Restaurant, or take it slow with a coffee in the Cotton Café, before afternoon cocktails at Miner’s Bar. Then ease your tired muscles after a hot day at the beach with a traditional Thai massage at Spa Qaqula, or work up a sweat in the onsite gym or in a Muay Thai or yoga class. When you’re not exploring every inch of this exquisite resort, take a stroll down Bang Niang and Khao Lak Beach, visiting nearby night markets, local restaurants and bars. Then head back for a decadent dock-to-dish seafood bounty and dance party at Kokulo Beach Club.

title: Tranquil Khao Lak Five-Star Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast, Welcome Cocktails & Massages
description:
Find sun-kissed tranquility at Moracea by Khao Lak Resort, a five-star oasis that sprawls from the serene hilltop onto 400 metres of unspoiled beachfront. The resort is the perfect hideaway to relax, soak up some sun and recharge. Take a dip in one of the four large swimming pools adjacent to the beach, pausing to order a lavish cocktail at the swim-up Bambu Bar. When you can drag yourself out of the water, Baimai Spa awaits to transport you to total relaxation with an aromatic massage, body wrap or scrub treatment (charges apply).

With peaceful villages, markets, waterfalls, tropical forests and, of course, an abundance of white-sand beaches nearby, including one at your doorstep, Khao Lak is unquestionably one of Thailand’s most popular holiday destinations for a relaxing getaway. And the five-star Moracea by Khao Lak Resort - winner of a Tripadvisor's 2021 Travellers' Choice award - provides the perfect launchpad to discover it all.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Celebrate your escape with a welcome cocktail each on arrival
- Your escape is off to a great start with seasonal fruits and flowers waiting in your room on arrival
- Wake up each morning to a delicious daily buffet breakfast at Malila Restaurant
- Unwind with an indulgent 30-minute massage for two at Baimai Spa
- Take your tastebuds on a journey through local cuisine with one three-course set lunch or dinner for two

**Extended stay bonus:** Extend your stay to 5+ nights to receive two 30-minute massages per person and a second three-course set lunch or dinner for two. Enjoy an 8+ night escape to receive one 60-minute massage per person and a daily three-course set lunch or dinner for two. For those who opt for a 10-night retreat, they'll enjoy two 60-minute massages per person, while 12-night stays can unwind with three 60-minute massages per person.

**Book with 100% Confidence**: If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Scoopon for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

title: Award-Winning Khao Lak Beach Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Massages & Cocktails
description:
Delicious dining, five-star facilities and luxurious rooms and villas, all sitting on the golden sands of one of Thailand’s best beaches - it can only be The Haven Khao Lak, a secluded retreat that celebrates Thai hospitality and modern indulgence. Tucked away between the Andaman Sea and a tropical lagoon, this oasis is secluded enough to allow for true escapism but close enough to all of Khao Lak’s action for cultural immersion.

Tropical luxury is served in spades at The Haven Khao Lak, with verdant gardens, sapphire-blue waters and a white-sand beach forming the backdrop to an indulgent escape. Explore the resort by water as you float down the 5,000sqm salt-water pool, or find a spot on the 380m-long Khuk Khak Beach, embracing true relaxation with a soundtrack of lapping water. Take that holiday feeling one step further at Aqua Spa, booking in for Thai massages, herbal ball compressions and body scrubs, or sip on a cocktail or two poolside, watching as the sun sets over the azure waters of the Andaman Sea. Every day here is gourmand heaven: begin with Andaman Sea vistas and daily buffet breakfast at Sundial Restaurant, nightly cocktails from The Scallop Bar - featuring submerged bar stools within Thailand's largest saltwater pool - or the serene Angel Wing Bar and finish every evening sampling freshly-caught seafood at Vongole Restaurant, alternating between the Thai and Italian menus for a global culinary experience.

Perched on the pristine sands of Khuk Khak Beach, this five-star retreat was fully refurbished in July 2020 and boasts a never-ending list of activities and facilities, perfect for families, friends and couples alike.

Float down Southeast Asia’s longest outdoor lagoon pool or get the heart rate up with a game of tennis or squash, before returning to one of the nine restaurants and bars onsite for a bite to eat, where Thai, Japanese, Italian and international flavours are all bound to make your mouth water. Little ones can splash around the children’s pool or learn and play at the Juniors Club, while the grown-ups can escape for a treatment or two at the rejuvenating Quan Spa. If you’re wondering how Hollywood celebrities travel with their families, it’s a lot like this.

The suites are brand new and offer easy access to the super fun kids’ area at the resort. If parents want some time away, drop the kids in the kids’ club for a few hours and head to the separate adults-only section of the resort. Rediscover a whole new level of luxury at the five-star Le Méridien Khao Lak Resort & Spa. A secluded haven of relaxation on the pristine sands of Bangsak Beach, the stunning resort reinvents the quintessential Khao Lak beachfront experience. Make the most of its private location with a plunge in the beach’s crystal-clear waters or indulge in the three signature lagoon pools and the luxury Khao Lak Spa. Children will enjoy access to the Kids' Club, while parents can make use of the Fitness Centre, private Muay Thai classes, and complimentary tennis and water sports equipment.

Bangsak Beach is blessed with unspoiled shores, casuarina-fringed inlets and spectacular offshore islands rimmed with azure waters and dense marine life. Outside of your quiet retreat, the Similan Islands are easily accessible and spectacular for seasonal snorkelling. Known to divers globally, this marine national park offers luminous aqua waters and luscious coral reefs with a smooth granite island of rainforest and blindingly white beaches on the surface.

Featuring a beautiful lagoon swimming pool, The Massage Sala by the beach and two restaurants serving up international cuisine with a locally inspired twist, this property puts the signature Outrigger spin on an iconic Thai paradise escape.

Look out onto towering coconut palms and enjoy the refreshing sea breeze while you dine on local and international fare at Café Andaman, enjoy refreshing cocktails while splashing about at the swim-up Pool Bar or climb to the rooftop Otter's Bar for ice-cold mai tais set against panoramic views of the Thailand's western coast.

When you aren't lounging poolside or enjoying a dip in the aquamarine sea, the hotel offers the perfect base to explore Khao Lak's tropical surrounds. Trek the depths of Khao Lak National Park, float through the jungle on a bamboo raft, or grab your snorkelling gear and explore the nearby Similan Islands, filled with stunning coral reefs and exciting marine life. Khao Lak is the ideal spot for a true Thai beachside experience, offering fun in the sun framed by jungle-clad mountains while remaining a quieter corner of the country to ensure you leave feeling completely relaxed. Fine dining restaurants await to cater to any appetite, whether you choose to dine on succulent seafood under the thatched roof of @Beach Bar and Restaurant, tuck into a flame-seared steak at Motown on Fire or enjoy a refreshing poolside drink in the tropical sun.

Discover the natural beauty of Thailand with a stay at the stunning Devasom Khao Lak, nestled between a natural lagoon and one of the country's most stunning sunset beaches. This small luxury property offers direct access to the flawless white sands of a private beach, framed by gently swaying palms. Savour the flavours of Thai-western fusion at the oceanfront Takola Thai Restaurant - featured in the Michelin Guide for 2025 - or for a more relaxed dining experience, head to Devasom Beach Grill and Bar, where you can dine alfresco on seafood as you watch the sun go down. Unwind at the onsite wellness centre, which offers Muay Thai classes, morning yoga, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a serene spa.

You can make the most of your Khao Lak experience by treating yourself to a Thai cooking class, an oceanfront cocktail party, a Thai garland-making class or by taking the guided spice tour of the property.
